name: Hidden Object Murder Mystery Adventure Games
name_original: Hidden Object Murder Mystery Adventure Games
description:
Join the Mysterious world! Travel around the globe to solve the series of the puzzle to escape Hidden Object Murder Mystery Adventure games. Investigate the suspects for clues and analyzes the killers to uncover the hidden truth. Use your all skills to explore the hidden world.

Are you ready to prove your detective skills? Investigates hundreds of crime scene! Search for clues and solve the mystery puzzle.

FEATURES:
● Investigate hidden crime scenes and discover the truth behind the murder
● Examine clues and analyze the castle to discover the killer
● Collect and analyze clues and evidence
● Play as to be the best detective ever
● Discover the mystery murder case
● Find hidden objects that help you to search the murderer
● Try it and get the best score for every adventure scene

Uncover the clues and secrets to Hidden Object Murder Mystery! Can you arrest the killer and escape before it’s too late?

Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think about this game. We would really appreciate your rating…
